header.description: Plugin which provides a step to extract 7zip archives.

step-type.name: Extract archive

property-ui.label: Directory Offset
property-ui.description: The directory offset relative to the current working directory where the step should run.

property-ui.label: Include Files
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of file filters for files to include.

property-ui.label: Exclude Files
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of file filters for files to exclude.

property-ui.label: Extract Directory
property-ui.description: The directory where the archives should be extracted.
